main event: Two objects resembling balloons were observed descending over Alberton, Montana on 30 May 1956.
interesting points: The objects were the size and shape of balloons,They were at an altitude of 40,000 feet,The color changed from white to red before disappearing,The observation lasted for 47 minutes,The sighting is believed to be related to four balloons from Versailles, California that lost pressure.
